sources.title: Where to Find Natural Wine: Los Angeles | UPDATED FOR 2024!
sources.content: Unfined Wines is a recently launched online wine shop available exclusively in Los Angeles, seeking to make natural wine approachable and available for Angelenos. Deliver same-day in greater Los Angeles and San Fernando Valley (West to Calabasas, East to El Monte, North to Sylmar and South to Torrance), 365 days a year. Option to order via WineHotline (phone or text) or through the website. The wines they carry at the very least use organic grapes and have no added chemicals during the winemaking process. In addition, the wines are a combination of any of the following: biodynamic, dry-farmed, sustainably-farmed, unfined, unfiltered and hand-harvested.
